thread.title: Annual 'Broadway & Gourmet on Avenue J' arrives Sunday
thread.title_full: Annual 'Broadway & Gourmet on Avenue J' arrives Sunday

author: Staff
title: Annual 'Broadway & Gourmet on Avenue J' arrives Sunday
text:
Annual 'Broadway & Gourmet on Avenue J' arrives Sunday Professional and amateur teams compete Posted: October 16, 2015 - 12:01am A-J MEDIA ENTERTAINMENT EDITOR 
The second annual “Broadway & Gourmet on Avenue J” will take place from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. Sunday at the LHUCA Plaza, 511 Ave. K, and at the Charles Adams Studio Project’s parking lot, across the street from the LHUCA Plaza. 
Professional and amateur teams from Texas Tech’s Restaurant, Hotel and Institutional Management program will compete in a Gourmet Appetizer Competition, followed by a performance of songs from Broadway musicals. 
Professional competitors include North Catering Co. (the 2014 winner), Crafthouse Gastropub, Funky Door, and West Table. The amateurs competing are four teams representing Tech’s RHIM program. 
Final decisions will be determined by professional judges, with votes from the first 200 visitors determining the People’s Choice Award. 
Also available are local food trucks and wine tastings and wine-by-the-glass sold by McPherson Cellars. 
The concert of Broadway tunes will be performed by Travis Burge, Annie Nichols, Joshua D. Reynolds, Desiree Soto and Katrina Wilson. 
There is no admission charge. The first 200 visitors participate in the appetizer competition; all visitors can buy items from the food truck and wine from McPherson Cellars. 
The event is sponsored by the Texas Tech College of Visual and Performing Arts and Ben E. Keith, and is a joint venture between Hub Theatre Group, Skyviews Restaurant and Texas Tech’s Restaurant, Hotel and RHIM program. 
Call Hub Theatre Group at (806) 939-6571 or visit hubtheatregroup.org for more details. 
william.kerns@lubbockonline.com
